hints.content: Let's try each strategy one at a time to see if they work.

Add $40+52$ then add $1$.

>$\begin{align}\greenD{41}+\purpleC{52}&=\greenD{40}+\greenD{1}+\purpleC{52}\\
&= \greenD{40}+\purpleC{52}+\greenD{1}\\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

**The following strategies can be used to add $41+52$.**

- Add $40+52$ then add $1$.

- Add $43+50$.

question.content:
**Select any strategy that can be used to add $41+52$.**
